sense.def:
Z izrazom
it is imperative that
poudarimo, da nekaj mora biti storjeno.

seg.quote: It's imperative that we take care of Liebermann immediately.

sense.def:
V slovnici je
an imperative
glagol v obliki, ki jo uporabljamo za dajanje navodil ali za pogovorna vabila. Na primer v izrazih
turn left at the next crossroads
in
have another biscuit
sta glagola
turn
in
have
v tej obliki.
